name: Die-A-Meateys
description:
Welcome to Die-A-Meatys, the first abortion from Foreskin Games!

You are a cancer patient that has undergone an experimental treatment gone wrong, now you have ligma and are made out of meat. In a fit of rage and sexual frustration, you begin to eat people. The goal is to eat the city and escape before the US Military neutralizes you.

HOW TO PLAY:

  • WASD: Move and Jump
  • Spacebar: also jumps
  • Esc; Pauses Game (Only available on Linux and Android)
  • Q: Give up life
  • R: Resets level (Only available on Linux and Android)
  • 𐑕𐑒𐑮𐑴𐑤 𐑤𐑪𐑒: 𐑛𐑵 𐑦𐑑 𐑑 𐑧𐑥.

If you have any further questions, use the discussion board below

Game developed by DerpsMcPineapple.
